segments.text: I can't believe how disgusting this scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring all over the floor, making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so naughty, taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it's just so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like she doesn't have a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch this, it's making me feel sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame the inside is such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would clean up this disgusting scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just so revolting, I can't stand to see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens, but it's just so hard to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
